stunner.name: Look like a Heartthrob
stunner.content: Heartbreaks are the worst! But can you wear your heart up your sleeve and turn things around? Make fashion your weapon and doll up for some self care! Make a get-ready video with a heartbreak song to reveal your unspoken emotions through your style. Upload before the 15th of Jan and stand a chance to win Rs. 1 Lac!

stunner.name: Fashion with Eyewear
stunner.content: Your eyes show off the strength of your soul, and it’s time to see the world with glasses that reflect your unique self. For the second challenge of Hipi Stunner January, make eyewear your main game and style your outfit accordingly to make a fashion statement. You can use prescription glasses or shades, whatever suits! Participate NOW – your last chance to bag Rs. 1 Lac.

stunner.name: Cover Shoot Ready!
stunner.content: Ever dreamt of being on the cover of a wedding magazine? Then this is your moment to shine!  For the first challenge of Hipi Stunner December, show us how you glam up for a wedding magazine shoot and upload the video on Hipi before 15th of December. See you with the second Challenge of this month on the 15th of December! Get red carpet ready NOW!

stunner.name: Glam-Up for New Year’s Eve
stunner.content: Stand out from the crowd this December! Show off your unique style for New Year’s Eve with a sizzling party-wear outfit! Make an eye-catchy video of you getting ready and reveal your final look. Upload it on the Hipi app before the 30th of December. Be cool, stunning, and hot! More importantly, be YOU!

stunner.name: Cozy yet fashionable!
stunner.content: Don’t we all love lazing around in our comfy warm clothes during winters? Now, cozy wear is easy, but can you pull off an unconventional, stylish yet warm outfit for the winters?  For the first challenge of Hipi Stunner November, record yourself in your best winter fit and show us the final look! Upload your videos on the Hipi app before the 15th of November. Don’t forget to use the hashtag #HipiStunner while uploading!

stunner.name: Zap to the 1950's
stunner.content: What If you get a chance to attend a glamourous 1950’s sangeet night? How would you dress up for that era? Make a short black and white video in a well-styled 50’s sangeet night fit and upload it on the Hipi app before the 30th of November. Take your winning shot at Hipi Stunner November NOW!

stunner.name: Festivities with a twist
stunner.content: We all love dressing up for festivals, don’t we? Showcase your festive swag this season! Don your ethnic attire with your unique twist in it, show us how you get ready and reveal the look at the end! Be the trendsetter you are and get a step closer to walking the red carpet of Zee Cine Awards! Participate NOW!

stunner.name: Celebrate like a Celeb
stunner.content: Don't all the stars look absolutely gorgeous in their ethnic attire for the festive season? For the second challenge, make a video dressing-up like your favourite celeb for Diwali and upload it on the Hipi app before 30th of October, and stand a chance to meet them at the red carpet of Zee Cine Awards!

stunner.name: To the Star in you
stunner.content: We’re feeling nostalgic! For the first challenge of Hipi Stunner September, make a fun video taking inspiration from the style of your favourite childhood actor or actress. Use their songs, signature step or act like them to make your video entertaining. Upload your video on the Hipi app before the 14th of September. Participate NOW!

stunner.name: Repurpose with Style
stunner.content: You would have seen your parents shuffle clothes, mix and match, and voila! They have a new outfit ready. Can you follow in their footsteps and show us three different looks using just three clothing items? Make an eye-catching fashion video and upload it on the Hipi app before the 30th of September. Hurry! Get a step closer to achieving your dream.

stunner.name: A Nostalgic Summer
stunner.content: Let’s take a trip down memory lane when in summer vacations, we visited our grandparents. The endless mango eating sessions, late night cold coffee sessions with cousins, the Khus infused air coolers, and breezy cotton clothes. For this challenge, take inspiration from your summer memories and create a video showing us your three all-time favourite summer outfits!  Upload it on the Hipi app before the 14th of August and get one step closer to becoming a Hipi Stunner.

stunner.name: For the Moody Monsoon
stunner.content: Do monsoons make you romantic or gloomy? Either way, we know fashion can uplift your mood! Try your best fashion combos and make a catchy video showing 5 monsoon fashion trends, but don’t forget to spice it up your way! Upload the videos on the Hipi app before 30th of August and take your second step to becoming the Hipi Stunner of August.
